dme-resource-record.body:
resource "dme_record" "$1" {
    # name - (Required) The name of the record `type` - (Required) The type of
    name = ""

    # domainid - (Optional) (String, Required) The domain id to add the
    domainid = ""

    # ttl - (Optional) (String,
    ttl = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "name" - The name of the record
    # "type" - The type of the record
    # "value" - The value of the record
    # "type" (see below)
    # "ttl" - The TTL of the record
    # "gtdLocation" - The GTD Location of the record on GTD enabled domains
}
